note:
Bee charmer, mycophile, permaculture practitioner, land steward. Wild for unique fruit/veg cultivar. Mom to a great little human. Wife of a sailor. Invested in improving our pluralistic democracy. Avid reader of political news, with great appreciation of objective journalism. History and Archaeology nerd.
Avatar- handful of marbles pulled from the soils around our old house.
Background- a lovely compilation of lichen.
Landscape design artist who paints with plants and sometimes, oil paints.
